InstructionData.Title: test2
InstructionData.Author: Noob
InstructionData.Instructions:
define door -324331872 # Ensure this hash ID is correct define stacker 1585641623
main: yield
# Test 1: Check if the door is open using the simplest `lbs` command lbs r10 door 0 Open 0 # Check if the door is open using Average mode beq r10 0 door_closed # Branch if door is not open
# Test output to verify the door is open sb door Open 1 # Force door to open if not already
door_closed: # Set the door to closed (for testing purposes) sb door Open 0 j main # Loop back to main
